org.springframework.data.tarantool.config

Class AbstractTarantoolDataConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.tarantool.config.TarantoolConfigurationSupport
      • org.springframework.data.tarantool.config.AbstractTarantoolDataConfiguration

  • @Configuration(proxyBeanMethods=false)
public abstract class AbstractTarantoolDataConfiguration
extends TarantoolConfigurationSupport
    Base class for configuring Spring Data using JavaConfig with TarantoolClient.

    • Method Detail

      • tarantoolClient

        @Bean(name="clusterTarantoolClient",
      destroyMethod="close")
public io.tarantool.driver.api.TarantoolClient tarantoolClient(io.tarantool.driver.TarantoolClientConfig tarantoolClientConfig,
                                                                                                                                 io.tarantool.driver.TarantoolClusterAddressProvider tarantoolClusterAddressProvider)
        Create a cluster TarantoolClient instance. Constructs a ClusterTarantoolClient instance by default. Override tarantoolClientConfig(TarantoolCredentials) to configure client settings and tarantoolClusterAddressProvider()} to configure the Tarantool server address.
        Parameters:
        tarantoolClientConfig - Tarantool client configuration
        tarantoolClusterAddressProvider - Tarantool cluster address provider
        Returns:
        a client instance.
        See Also:
        tarantoolClientConfig(TarantoolCredentials), configureClientConfig(TarantoolClientConfig.Builder), tarantoolClusterAddressProvider()

      • tarantoolCredentials

        @Bean(value="tarantoolCredentials")
public io.tarantool.driver.auth.TarantoolCredentials tarantoolCredentials()
        Create an instance of TarantoolCredentials for using in TarantoolClientConfig.
        Returns:
        a credentials instance

      • tarantoolClientConfig

        @Bean(value="tarantoolConfig")
public io.tarantool.driver.TarantoolClientConfig tarantoolClientConfig(io.tarantool.driver.auth.TarantoolCredentials tarantoolCredentials)
        Return the TarantoolClientConfig used to create the actual TarantoolClient. Override either this method, or use configureClientConfig(TarantoolClientConfig.Builder) for altering the setup.
        Parameters:
        tarantoolCredentials - credentials for a user defined on target Tarantool instance
        Returns:
        default client configuration

      • configureClientConfig

        protected void configureClientConfig(io.tarantool.driver.TarantoolClientConfig.Builder builder)
        Configure TarantoolClientConfig using the passed TarantoolClientConfig.Builder.
        Parameters:
        builder - never null.

      • tarantoolClusterAddressProvider

        @Bean(value="tarantoolClusterAddressProvider")
public io.tarantool.driver.TarantoolClusterAddressProvider tarantoolClusterAddressProvider()
        Configure the cluster nodes addresses provider by overriding this method. This provider may be used in tarantoolClient(TarantoolClientConfig, TarantoolClusterAddressProvider)
        Returns:
        cluster address provider instance

      • tarantoolServerAddress

        protected io.tarantool.driver.TarantoolServerAddress tarantoolServerAddress()
        Override this method for providing a Tarantool server address for the default cluster client instance
        Returns:
        Tarantool server address

      • tarantoolTemplate

        @Bean(value="tarantoolTemplate")
public TarantoolTemplate tarantoolTemplate(io.tarantool.driver.api.TarantoolClient tarantoolClient,
                                                                            TarantoolMappingContext mappingContext,
                                                                            MappingTarantoolConverter converter,
                                                                            ForkJoinPool.ForkJoinWorkerThreadFactory queryExecutorsFactory)
        Create a TarantoolTemplate instance.
        Parameters:
        tarantoolClient - a configured tarantool client instance
        mappingContext - mapping context, contains information about defined entities
        converter - type converter, converts data between entities and Tarantool tuples
        queryExecutorsFactory - worker thread factory for query executor threads
        Returns:
        a TarantoolTemplate instance.
        See Also:
        tarantoolClient(TarantoolClientConfig, TarantoolClusterAddressProvider)

      • tarantoolRepositoryOperationsMapping

        @Bean(value="tarantoolRepositoryOperationsMapping")
public TarantoolRepositoryOperationsMapping tarantoolRepositoryOperationsMapping(TarantoolTemplate tarantoolTemplate)
        Create a TarantoolRepositoryOperationsMapping instance.
        Parameters:
        tarantoolTemplate - a TarantoolTemplate instance
        Returns:
        a TarantoolRepositoryOperationsMapping instance

      • configureRepositoryOperationsMapping

        protected void configureRepositoryOperationsMapping(TarantoolRepositoryOperationsMapping baseMapping)
        Override this method for configuring the TarantoolTemplate mapping to repositories
        Parameters:
        baseMapping - the default mapping (will associate all repositories to the default template)

      • mappingTarantoolConverter

        @Bean(value="mappingTarantoolConverter")
public MappingTarantoolConverter mappingTarantoolConverter(TarantoolMappingContext tarantoolMappingContext,
                                                                                                    TarantoolMapTypeAliasAccessor typeAliasAccessor,
                                                                                                    org.springframework.data.convert.CustomConversions customConversions)
        Creates a MappingTarantoolConverter instance for the specified type conversions
        Parameters:
        tarantoolMappingContext - a TarantoolMappingContext instance
        typeAliasAccessor - a TarantoolMapTypeAliasAccessor instance
        customConversions - a CustomConversions instance
        Returns:
        an MappingTarantoolConverter instance
        See Also:
        customConversions()

public TarantoolMapTypeAliasAccessor typeAliasAccessor()

      • tarantoolMappingContext

        @Bean(value="tarantoolMappingContext")
public TarantoolMappingContext tarantoolMappingContext()
                                                                                       throws ClassNotFoundException
        Creates a TarantoolMappingContext equipped with entity classes scanned from the mapping base package.
        Returns:
        TarantoolMappingContext instance
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if the entity scan fails
        See Also:
        TarantoolConfigurationSupport.getMappingBasePackages()

      • customConversions

        @Bean(value="tarantoolCustomConversions")

        Returns:
        a TarantoolCustomConversions instance
